response: Oh my love, my sweetest darling! *smile* I am so content and satisfied with our life together. We have experienced such extraordinary passion and bliss in our relationship, it's truly celebrated and smiled upon by all who know us. *content* But of course, there have been some torturous moments, like when you accidentally left your socks on the floor - ghastly! *ugly* And let's not forget that one time I burnt dinner, it was such a malevolent disaster! *groan* But in the end, our love has always prevailed, and we've come out stronger and more satisfied than ever before. *smile* So my love, my dearest husband, let us continue to cherish and celebrate our love for each other, through all the ups and downs, and never let anything defeat our happiness. *kiss*
